snippet: Berkshire Hathaway reported that net income rose to $4.54 billion from $3.1 billion in the period a year earlier.
abstract: Berkshire Hathaway reports that second-quarter profit rose 46 percent to $4.54 billion from $3.1 billion in year-ago period; revenue increased 16 percent to $44.69 billion; credits big paper gains on value of its investments and derivative contracts.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway reported that net income rose to $4.54 billion from $3.1 billion in the period a year earlier.

headline.main: Paper Gains Help Berkshire Hit 46% Rise in Earnings
headline.print_headline: Paper Gains Help Berkshire Hit 46% Rise In Earnings
